Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Provides for additional veteran real property owner exemption where veterans otherwise eligible but not discharged from a current combat duty status
Summary: Provides for additional veteran real property owner exemption where veteran is otherwise eligible but not yet discharged from a current combat duty status.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to veteran eligibility for real property tax exemptions
